20101215181414.500|20101215181417.000|CCO|DROPPED OUT OF HARVARD.

20101215181419.500|20101215181422.000|CCO|HIS FAVORITE MUSICIANS INCLUDE 
20101215181422.000|20101215181425.333|CCO|LADY GAGA, ON THE LIST OF A LOT

20101215181432.000|20101215181434.000|CCO|PRINCELY WHEN HE WAS YOUNG AND
